subject: General English
question_en: Read the sentence and find the part which contains an error: 'Each of the boys / were given / a book to read.'
question_hi: वाक्य को पढ़ें और वह भाग चुनें जिसमें त्रुटि है: 'Each of the boys / were given / a book to read.'
explanation_hi: 'Each' एकवचन है, इसलिए 'were' की जगह 'was' आएगा।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the error in: 'I prefer tea / than coffee / in the morning.'
question_hi: इस वाक्य में त्रुटि खोजें: 'I prefer tea / than coffee / in the morning.'
explanation_hi: 'Prefer' के बाद 'than' की जगह 'to' आता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the part with an error: 'The climate of Rajasthan / are hot / in summer.'
question_hi: त्रुटि वाला भाग चुनें: 'The climate of Rajasthan / are hot / in summer.'
explanation_hi: 'Climate' एकवचन है, इसलिए 'are' की जगह 'is' होगा।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the error: 'She is the most tallest girl / in the class / today.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'She is the most tallest girl / in the class / today.'
A_en: She is the most tallest girl
A_hi: She is the most tallest girl
explanation_en: Double superlative 'most tallest' is incorrect; use only 'tallest'.
explanation_hi: दोहरा superlative 'most tallest' गलत है; केवल 'tallest' लिखें।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the incorrect part: 'The teacher asked / that why / I was late.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'The teacher asked / that why / I was late.'
explanation_hi: Indirect question में 'why' से पहले 'that' नहीं आता।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the error: 'One of the students / have forgotten / his book.'
question_hi: त्रुटि चुनें: 'One of the students / have forgotten / his book.'
explanation_hi: 'One' एकवचन है, इसलिए 'have' की जगह 'has' आएगा।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the mistake: 'He knows / to swim / very well.'
question_hi: गलती खोजें: 'He knows / to swim / very well.'
explanation_hi: 'Know' के बाद 'how to swim' आता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the error: 'The committee / are divided / in opinion.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'The committee / are divided / in opinion.'
explanation_en: When committee acts as one unit, use singular verb 'is'.
explanation_hi: जब committee एक इकाई के रूप में हो तो singular verb 'is' आएगा।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the incorrect part: 'Neither of the answers / are correct / in this test.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'Neither of the answers / are correct / in this test.'
explanation_hi: 'Neither' एकवचन है, इसलिए 'are' की जगह 'is' होगा।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the error: 'The scissors / is sharp / be careful.'
question_hi: त्रुटि खोजें: 'The scissors / is sharp / be careful.'
explanation_en: 'Scissors' is always plural, so 'are' should replace 'is'.
explanation_hi: 'Scissors' हमेशा बहुवचन होता है, इसलिए 'is' की जगह 'are' आएगा।
